Html:
Hi ,

Happy Earth Day! Our planet is facing more trouble with every passing year—from the climate crisis to polluted air and water.

It’s time we tried to do something about it.

Check out this really inspiring video, and send it to 3 more friends:

http://www.greenpeace.org/india/give-earth-a-hand Help get millions of new people involved in saving our one and only home.

Thanks!

ramkchirra@gmail.com

You are receiving this email because someone you know sent it to you from the Greenpeace site. Greenpeace retains no information about individuals contacted through its site, and will not send you further messages without your consent -- although your friends could, of course, send you another message.
